TopicTitle: First mission to Dres and Back

Articles.Content:
So I decided to do a mission out to Dres to take a break from Eve and the Jool system. I wound up finding out that I over engineered my lander, but that's ok because it was small and light anyway. Dres seems like a nice place to drop a rover with some kerbals and tool around for a bit, gravity seems similar to Mun, but I didn't check the stats.

Here's a pick and video of my latest mission.
Great work. I found the inclination of Dres was a killer.

Great work. I found the inclination of Dres was a killer.

Yeah a full 5 degrees, I packed plenty of fuel so I had enough to go and get back.
I really wanted to watch your video but after 5 mins I felt motion sick after all your incessant camera movements!

I really wanted to watch your video but after 5 mins I felt motion sick after all your incessant camera movements!

Sorry I guess... It's a habit from being a 3d modeler.
